news.title: Get ready to complain to a chatbot: AIs to take over customer support
news.summary: It's so hard to speak to a real person on the phone these days. Almost any time you need to call your bank, doctor or any other service, you'll probably be greeted by an automated service seemingly designed to prevent you from speaking to someone…

news.title: Emotionless chatbots handling customer services is bad news for consumers
news.summary: It’s so hard to speak to a real person on the phone these days. Almost any time you need to call your bank, doctor or any other service, you’ll probably be greeted by an automated service seemingly designed to prevent you from speaking to someone…
